name: Boullata
overview: Boullata, published in 1984 by Al Alamiah, is a program to create and use graphical motifs and can be used on any MSX (an Arabic MSX is not required). The main menu includes 3 options : 1 – appreciated motifs – 2 – simulated motifs – 3 – game. Back to previous menu with ESC, to main menu with F2, to main menu with change (arabic or english) with F1.
